channel.title: I need the numbers to add to rares to be exactly like these prices
channel.description:
can some1 tell me the numbers i need to make these items this price in a store :)
Christmas Cracker - 800-850Mil Blue Phat - 400Mil Red Phat - 205Mil White Phat - 250Mil Yellow Phat - 160Mil Green Phat - 175Mil Purple Phat - 145Mil Santa Hat - 25Mil Red H'Ween Mask - 35Mil Blue H'Ween Mask - 23Mil Green H'Ween Mask - 17Mil Disk Of Return - 9Mil

item.title: I need the numbers to add to rares to be exactly like these prices
item.dc:creator: @dbmain dbmain
item.description:
@dbmain wrote:

open up your item.cfg and find what ever item it is like Christmas_Cracker you should see its name and its discription then a lot of numbers the first three after the discription are the ones you have to change replace thoes first 3 numbers with 630045284.50482378420949005709785
witch is 800mil. the waty i didthat was to open up a calculator take the price and devide by 1.26875
exp.
800000000/1.26875=630045284.50482378420949005709785

Read full topic
item.source: I need the numbers to add to rares to be exactly like these prices
